description: Try our easy to follow Garlic & Thyme Beef Marinade recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Garlic & Thyme Beef Marinade Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Mix wine, oil, mustard, garlic and thyme in a bowl. Season with salt and pepper pour into a shallow dish. Add steaks to marinade and turn to coat then cover and refrigerate for at least 1 hour or overnight. Remove meat from refrigerator and allow to come to room temperature.
When ready to cook, drain excess marinade from meat. Cook on the char grill turning once until cooked to your liking. Allow 3-4 minutes each side for medium, depending on the thickness of the meat.
